title: About IIR 2025
description: The purpose of the Italian Information Retrieval Workshop (IIR) is to provide a meeting forum for stimulating and disseminating research in Information Retrieval, where researchers and other academic and industrial players interested in IR research can network and discuss their research results in an informal way.

title: Call for Papers
description: IIR 2025 welcomes submissions on all aspects of Information Retrieval. We particularly encourage PhD students and Early-Stage Researchers to submit their research.

title: Venue
description: IIR 2025 will take place in Cagliari, Sardinia. Known for its stunning beaches and turquoise-blue waters, Cagliari is a popular destination with rich history and culture.
